name: bk_GenAI Clipper (ChatGPT)

properties.name: tags
properties.value: clippings, ChatGPT, {{\"Generate and list tags related to the content of {{content}}, connected by commas, with no spaces in tags, and capitalize the first letter of words when necessary, exclude CMDS\"}}

noteNameFormat: {{"Summarize the content in 5 words or less"}}
